step_original: Particular provisions: Products which are not containing or consisting of betel leaves (‘Piper betle’)
step_description:
You must not import any food containing betel leaves (Piper Betle) from Bangladesh.
Betel leaves (also known as 'paan leaf' or ' or 'betel liquid') from Bangladesh can carry salmonella strains.
You must declare that your products do not contain betel leaves.
